ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in the ocean and clowns around. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 You might have seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink. What am I?
I am a very large sea animal that sings songs and breathes air. What am I?
I am a sea creature that has a hard shell and walks sideways. What am I?
I am a star-shaped creature that lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live near the bottom of the ocean.
🖐️ I look like a star from the sky.

ocean.question: I am a very slow animal that carries my home on my back in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat sea grass.

ocean.question: I am long and thin, and some people think I am scary. I swim in the ocean and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 Some types can be dangerous to humans.

ocean.question: I float in the ocean and can sting you if you get too close. I don't have a brain! What am I?
I am a long, thin creature that looks like a snake but lives in the ocean. Some are electric! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ Some types can give you a shock.
🌊 I hide in rocks and coral.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?
I am small and red, with black spots on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Farmers love me because I eat bad bugs.

bug.question: I can jump very high and I'm usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am NOT a frog, but I can jump like one.
🎶 You might hear me singing in a field!

bug.question: I live in a colony and I'm very strong for my size. I carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can lift things many times my own weight!
🏠 We live underground in large groups.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then I change into something beautiful that can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I come out at night and like to bite. I leave an itchy bump. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I buzz in your ear when you are sleeping

bug.question: I am a beetle that glows in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 People like to catch me in jars.
🌃 I'm not a star, but I shine like one.

bug.question: I make a loud chirping sound, especially in the summer. I have strong back legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I am known for my song.

bug.question: I can blend in with leaves and flowers, and I eat other bugs. I sometimes look like I am praying. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am a master of disguise.
🙏 My front legs are often held in a folded position.
